reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's style, particularly appreciating the amazing detail of the flower design, and find it comfortable, soft, and warm. Moreover, the fit is great, with one customer noting it works well through busy areas. However, the size receives mixed feedback, with some saying it's perfect while others find it runs very small. Additionally, the material quality also gets mixed reviews.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater
items.body: Cute sweater. Very soft and comfortable. Fits true to size Read more
items.author: Sophie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely and comfy!
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater. It is cozy, warm and soft. I get loads of compliments every time I wear it! Read more
items.author: joyce f. ventre

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pink sweater
items.body: I love the color and it’s nice and warm Read more
items.author: Jenny Robelli

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits true to size
items.body: So, I wanted to love this sweater. I bought it in black and also in white, to see which I liked better. When I tried on the white sweater, well, the comment I received was that the black flowers on the white sweater looked like spiders. And I couldn't stop thinking that, so, black sweater made the cut. LOL The sweater is a nice weight for a colder day, and the fit was right (medium) for me. I typically wear a medium top/ sweater. I knocked off one star for the spiders. Read more
items.author: jen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute sweater
items.body: I love this sweater! I've only worn it once so far, but I had 3 different people stop me to tell me how cute it was. I ordered a medium (my normal size). It is a little roomy (as pictured), but definitely not baggy. I first tried it on with jeans, adorable. I wore it out with a black skirt and tall black/white boots. Both looks totally worked! I will be wearing this one often this fall/winter. Read more
items.author: momof boys

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but too small for me.
items.body: Super cute and nice material. Unfortunately too small so I have to return it. Read more
items.author: Ms.pockets

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!!!
items.body: Gorgeous and feels super soft Read more
items.author: GUZZI

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality
items.body: Awesome sweater. Nice quality and so soft. Perfect fit! Read more
items.author: P. Campana

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gray, Navy, Pink, White, Berry Red, Azure Blue, Ivory, Army Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
